schema.description: Identifier

id.description: The unique identifier of the firewall rule.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

action.description: The action to apply to a matched request. The `log` action is only available on an Enterprise plan.

description.description: An informative summary of the firewall rule.
description.example: Blocks traffic identified during investigation for MIR-31

id.description: The unique identifier of the firewall rule.

paused.description: When true, indicates that the firewall rule is currently paused.

priority.description: The priority of the rule. Optional value used to define the processing order. A lower number indicates a higher priority. If not provided, rules with a defined priority will be processed before rules without a priority.

items.description: A list of products to bypass for a request when using the `bypass` action.

ref.description: A short reference tag. Allows you to select related firewall rules.

description.description: An informative summary of the filter.
description.example: Restrict access from these browsers on this address range.

expression.description: The filter expression. For more information, refer to [Expressions](https://developers.cloudflare.com/ruleset-engine/rules-language/expressions/).

id.description: The unique identifier of the filter.

paused.description: When true, indicates that the filter is currently paused.

ref.description: A short reference tag. Allows you to select related filters.

deleted.description: When true, indicates that the firewall rule was deleted.

id.description: The unique identifier of the filter.

GET /zones/{zone_identifier}/firewall/ru.description: Fetches firewall rules in a zone. You can filter the results using several optional parameters.

schema.description: Identifier
A case-insensitive string to find in the description.
The action to search for. Must be an exact match.
Page number of paginated results.
Number of firewall rules per page.
The unique identifier of the firewall rule.
When true, indicates that the firewall rule is currently paused.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results
